ygData.subject: Re: quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Where is the stupid messenger.  All I got was that he is in an inn on the western edge of the Commonlands.  Well, is that the east commonlands, or west
ygData.messageBody:
Where is the stupid messenger. All I got was that he is in an inn on the
"western edge" of the Commonlands. Well, is that the east commonlands, or
west commonlands. I have checked all the inns I think, with no success
finding anyone other than merchants. Please reply to me personally with the
location of this messenger if you don't want to spoil the quest for the
whole list.

- Toobookoo
lvl 9

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JACKiam1@... [mailto:JACKiam1@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 4:13 PM
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] Re: quests
>
>
> From: JACKiam1@...
>
> There;s the quest to kill grolaf, the Dwarf smithy, he's like level 50
> hehe... there's also a quest to kill a messenger from qeynos and
> retrive a
> note intended for the Paladins the messenger is low level and
> doing the quest
> leads you onto a few other quests... including the quest to kill
> lady shae,
> this ive done a fair few times but she hasnt dropped the quest item ehhe.
>
